title: Breaking: Celebrity endorses fake health cure
text: A famous celebrity claimed that drinking a gallon of vinegar daily cures all diseases. Experts have debunked this as a myth.

title: Local elections held peacefully
text: The city witnessed a peaceful local election yesterday with high voter turnout and no reports of violence.

title: Shocking! Scientists hide the truth about Mars
text: A secret NASA document allegedly proves that life exists on Mars, but scientists are hiding it from the public.

title: Economic growth exceeds expectations
text: The finance ministry released new data showing a 6.2% economic growth this quarter, surpassing forecasts.

title: COVID-19 vaccine turns people into zombies
text: A viral post claims the new COVID-19 vaccine causes zombie-like symptoms. Medical officials say it's completely false.
